# File lib/ramaze/contrib/sequel/image.rb, line 166
    def cleanup
      conf[:sizes].each do |name, args|
        out = public_file(name)
        Ramaze::Log.debug "Remove Thumbnail: #{out}"
        FileUtils.rm_f(out)
      end

      Ramaze::Log.debug "Remove original: #{original}"
      FileUtils.rm_f(original)
    end
